name: Doggonomicon
description:
Stuart the wizard dogs owner just bought a new book for her shelf and it spells no good. Help Stu protect the bookshelf from the demons it's attracting .

CONTROLS : 

Aim with mouse

Left click to shoot

Made for the 172nd trijam in under 3 hours

Didn't quite get to do  everything I wanted to, but a fun experience building it regardless. I have a lot to improve on with time management skills so this was an eye opener.
